name: ET Blog Style For Divi
author: Justin Boughton

sections.description: Install this plugin to change the style of your blog posts to match the design at elegantthemes.com. Uses the same code as their official tutorial, just in plugin form.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation

  1. Log in to your WordPress admin panel, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.
  2. In the search field type “ET Blog Style For Divi” and click Search Plugins. From the search results, pick ET Blog Style For Divi and click Install Now. WordPress will ask you to confirm to complete the installation.

Manual Installation

  1. Extract the zip file.
  2. Upload them to /wp-content/plugins/ directory on your WordPress installation.
  3. Then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Changed names of functions to comply with WordPress.org guidelines. Minified CSS.

1.0

  • Initial Release.

short_description: Made to simplify the process of adding the custom styles and scripts to the blog page for the Divi theme.
description: Install this plugin to change the style of your blog posts to match the design at elegantthemes.com. Uses the same code as their official tutorial, just in plugin form.
